title: Doorway hanging Toran

  techniques_name: sewing (needleworking technique) embroidering

  physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of four peacocks
 various foliage
 and a deity in the center. There are sewn-on inscriptions on two panels at the bottom of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular
 with a rectangular top
 and five dangling panels along the bottom.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a toran or a doorway hanging. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The toran is decorated with stylized depictions of four peacocks, various foliage, and a deity in the center. There are sewn-on inscriptions on two panels at the bottom of the hanging. The shape of the toran is irregular, with a rectangular top, and five dangling panels along the bottom.
